content: {"name": "Kera's Helping Hands", "alternate_name": "", "description": "Kera\u2019s HelpingHands Food Pantry is Open 542 Moreland Ave Atlanta Georgia , 30316 2nd floor Room 214 12/6pm requires \nHead of house , 10$ donation fee", "email": "", "url": "https://www.facebook.com/KeraHelpingHands/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "542 Moreland Avenue Southeast", "address_2": null, "city": "East Atlanta", "state_province": "GA", "postal_code": "30316", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 33.7397245, "longitude": -84.3488641}, "phones": [{"number": "(404) 399-7592", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "15:00", "closes_at": "23:00"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "15:00", "closes_at": "23:00"}, {"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "18:00", "closes_at": "22:00"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "18:00", "closes_at": "22:00"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "18:00", "closes_at": "22:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Wear Facemask"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Client can visit: Once a week "}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Closed on major holidays"}, {"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Diapers and Clothes upon availability"}]}
